assessments.status_rationale: No FOMC decision has been made yet for the November 2025 meeting. News references (e.g., Lisa Cook remaining at the Fed and data gaps from the shutdown) do not determine the outcome.
The ISM Services PMI for September 2025 is due on 2025-10-03; no release or figure appears in the provided news.
The September 2025 PPI release is scheduled for 2025-10-09. Articles note the shutdown may disrupt data, but no PPI figure is reported.
No BEA Core PCE data for September 2025 has been released. The shutdown may delay the 2025-10-31 release, but outcome is not yet known.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report details are cited in the news. No confirmation of the gasoline product supplied threshold being met.
There is no report of the VIX closing at or below 13.00. Market commentary does not provide specific VIX close levels.
No evidence that OpenAI’s Sora app reached the U.S. iOS Top Free Apps top 3. App Store rankings are not referenced.
Coverage of NVIDIA discusses strategy and risks but does not indicate a $5T market cap being reached.
No OFAC Russia-related sanctions action adding 20+ SDN entries is mentioned in the news.
No Freddie Mac PMMS weekly mortgage rate figures are cited. Threshold status can’t be verified from provided sources.
No Department of Labor initial jobless claims figures are reported here, so the 230,000+ threshold is unconfirmed.
